Soin

Korean: 서인

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Son So-hee
Native name:
손소희

Introduction

Soin is a South Korean singer and songwriter who made her solo debut on August 21, 2020, with "곡명재수없는 일기장 (prod. Ethan)", a single for the Tone Project (vol. 5). She’s also a member of the band Habit, which debuted in December 2017.

Debut:
Aug 21, 2020
Current state:
active 
Active years:
2020-present
